fruit.label: Fruits
fruit.heading: Our Fruits - Fresh, High Quality, and Diverse!
fruit.description: Here you can find a wide variety of freshly picked fruits from our local farms. We promise high quality and excellent service to enjoy every fruit with ease and comfort.

vegetable.label: Vegetables
vegetable.heading: Our Vegetables - Fresh and Healthy for the Whole Family!
vegetable.description: Our vegetables are grown in fertile fields with great attention to freshness and health. You will find seasonal vegetables specially selected for you.

meat.label: Meat
meat.heading: Our Meat - Fresh, High Quality, and Diverse!
meat.description: Here you can find a wide variety of fresh meats carefully selected from our local suppliers. We guarantee high quality and excellent service to enjoy every piece of meat with ease and comfort.

fish.label: Fish
fish.heading: Our Fish - Fresh, High Quality, and Diverse!
fish.description: Here you can find a wide variety of freshly caught fish by our local fishermen. We promise high quality and excellent service to enjoy every fish with ease and comfort.

fruits.label: Fruits
fruits.heading: Our Fruits - Fresh, High Quality, and Diverse!
fruits.description: Here you can find a wide variety of freshly picked fruits from our local farms. We promise high quality and excellent service to enjoy every fruit with ease and comfort.

vegetable.label: Vegetables
vegetable.heading: Our Vegetables - Fresh and Healthy for the Whole Family!
vegetable.description: Our vegetables are grown in fertile fields with great attention to freshness and health. You will find seasonal vegetables specially selected for you.

meat.label: Meat
meat.heading: Our Meat - Fresh, High Quality, and Diverse!
meat.description: Here you can find a wide variety of fresh meats carefully selected from our local suppliers. We guarantee high quality and excellent service to enjoy every piece of meat with ease and comfort.

fish.label: Fish
fish.heading: Our Fish - Fresh, High Quality, and Diverse!
fish.description: Here you can find a wide variety of freshly caught fish by our local fishermen. We promise high quality and excellent service to enjoy every fish with ease and comfort.

dairy.label: Dairy
dairy.heading: Dairy Products - Fresh, High Quality, and Diverse!
dairy.description: Here you can find a wide selection of carefully chosen natural dairy products from our local suppliers. We guarantee high quality and excellent service to enjoy every product with ease and comfort.

spices.label: Spices
spices.heading: Our Spices - Natural, Diverse, and Aromatic!
spices.description: A wide variety of natural spices carefully selected from our local suppliers. We promise excellent quality and refined service.

bakery.label: Bakery
bakery.heading: Our Bakery - Fresh, High Quality, and Diverse!
bakery.description: Here you can find a large selection of freshly baked goods prepared daily. We guarantee high quality and excellent service to enjoy every piece with ease and comfort.

beverages.label: Beverages
beverages.heading: Our Beverages - Refreshing, Healthy, and Diverse!
beverages.description: A selection of juices, soft drinks, and water with high quality and great taste to quench your thirst at every moment.

frozen.label: Frozen
frozen.heading: Our Frozen Products - Fresh, Convenient, and Diverse!
frozen.description: Enjoy a wide variety of high-quality frozen products that save you time and effort in preparing your favorite meals.

snacks.label: Snacks
snacks.heading: Our Snacks - Delicious, Diverse, and Suitable for Every Occasion!
snacks.description: Discover our wide selection of crispy, sweet, and salty snacks. Perfect for picnics, hospitality, or simply enjoying a delicious moment.

baby.label: Baby
baby.heading: Baby Products - The Best Care for Your Kids!
baby.description: A carefully selected range of products that meet your child's needs from the start of life. From diapers to oils and creams, we offer you the best.

cleaning.label: Cleaning
cleaning.heading: Cleaning Products - Effective and Safe for Every Corner of Your Home!
cleaning.description: Discover our wide range of cleaning products that ensure cleanliness and disinfection, providing effective results without damaging surfaces or health. Quality and safety are at your fingertips.

pasta-and-Rice.label: Pasta and Rice
pasta-and-Rice.heading: Pasta and Rice - Delicious and Diverse!
pasta-and-Rice.description: Enjoy a great selection of pasta and rice with various flavors and shapes to suit every taste.

house.label: Household Essentials
house.heading: Household Essentials - Everything You Need Under One Roof!
house.description: A variety of essential and practical products that make your home more comfortable and organized. From kitchen tools to storage solutions – we have everything you need to make your daily life easier.

alcohol.label: Alcoholic
alcohol.heading: Alcoholic Beverages - A Distinctive Selection for Your Special Times!
alcohol.description: A curated selection of premium alcoholic beverages from top brands. Enjoy a unique atmosphere with our special drinks.

health.label: Health
health.heading: Health Products - Enhance Your Health and Vitality!
health.description: A range of dietary supplements and vitamins that help you improve your health. Discover natural products that support your healthy lifestyle.

watches.label: Watches
watches.heading: Watches – Timeless Style and Precision
watches.description: Discover our collection of watches that blend elegance, innovation, and craftsmanship. From classic designs to smartwatches, find the perfect piece for every occasion.

women-clothes.label: Women’s Clothing
women-clothes.heading: Women’s Clothing – Timeless Fashion and Perfect Comfort
women-clothes.description: Discover our women’s clothing collection that combines modern style, quality, and comfort. From casual wear to evening dresses – find the perfect piece for every occasion.

women-bags.label: Bags for Women
women-bags.heading: Bags for Women – A Perfect Blend of Style and Functionality
women-bags.description: Discover our collection of bags for women, featuring trendy designs and comfortable everyday carry options. From small purses to large totes, find the perfect bag for every style and occasion.

cigarettes.label: Cigarettes
cigarettes.heading: Cigarettes – Quality and Tradition in Every Puff
cigarettes.description: Explore our wide selection of cigarettes offering rich flavors and premium blends. Whether you prefer classic tastes or lighter options, find your perfect smoke here.

discountsAndOffers.discountsAndOffersDescription: We always offer discounts and benefits on seasonal fruits and vegetables, as well as packages suitable for families. Stay updated on our page to save even more!

seo.categoryDescription: Browse a variety of fresh and high-quality {{category}} on our website!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heading: Shuk HaBina - Organic Fruits and Vegetables
contact.intro: At 'Shuk HaBina', we are proud to offer fresh organic fruits and vegetables delivered straight to your doorstep, with an emphasis on quality and excellent service.
contact.goal: Our goal is to provide our customers with the healthiest fruits and vegetables, while adhering to organic farming and sustainable agriculture principles. Join us for a healthy and delicious lifestyle.
contact.teamDesc: We have a skilled and dedicated team ready to help with any questions. Whether you're inquiring about our products, placing an order, or discussing another topic – we are here for you.
contact.note: We are always happy to hear from our customers, and our team works hard to ensure you receive the best service. Don’t hesitate to reach out with any questions or requests.
contact.address: If you’d like to visit us in person, we are located at: 45 Jerusalem Blvd, Tel Aviv
contact.thanks: Thank you for choosing us – we’re happy to help you enjoy healthy, quality food!

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: In our app, Corner Market, we respect your privacy and understand the importance of protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information, including when signing in with Google.

collectedInfo.title: What Information Do We Collect?
collectedInfo.text: When logging in via Google, we obtain the following information from your account:

info.name: First and last name – as defined in your Google profile.
info.email: Email address – the address used for registration.
info.image: Profile picture – if available, will be displayed in your app profile.

collectedInfo.technical: Additionally, we may store technical data such as IP address, browser type, and operating system for security and service improvement purposes.

usage.title: How Do We Use the Information?

points.p1: To register the user and verify identity.
points.p2: To improve the user experience in the app.
points.p3: To send relevant notifications, updates, or reminders.
points.p4: To secure the system and protect your account.

consent.title: Transparency and Consent
consent.text: When logging in via Google, you will be asked to grant access to your information. We only request the permissions necessary for proper functionality, maintaining full transparency.

points.external: External services: Information is shared only with providers essential for operating the app.
points.law: Legal compliance: We only share information if legally required.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.text: We take advanced technical and organizational measures to protect your information. However, no protection is absolute, so we recommend avoiding password sharing and choosing a strong password.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.text: This policy may change from time to time. We will notify you within the app or via direct message. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of the updates.

points.p1: Right to access the personal information stored about you.
points.p2: Right to correct incorrect or incomplete information.
points.p3: Right to request deletion of data – unless legally required to retain it.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For any question or request regarding privacy, you can contact us via phone:

userConsent.title: User Consent
userConsent.text: By using the app, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to this privacy policy. If you do not agree – please refrain from using the app.

removeAccount.heading: Delete Account
removeAccount.description: If you delete the account, this action cannot be undone
